parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (CMF 11240002) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for tracking and reporting purposes in Romanian political advertising.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Valeriu Iftime, the president of PNL Botoșani.  It directly promotes the PNL party and encourages voting for "Echipa Valeriu Iftime," clearly linking the candidate to the desired electoral outcome. This fulfills the criteria of Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide geographical area (Botoșani County and its diaspora) and is not a private communication.  The reach estimate (100K-500K) further confirms its intention to reach a large audience. This satisfies the condition of Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Valeriu Iftime and the PNL party in the parliamentary elections.  Phrases like "Avem nevoie de toată mobilizarea pentru alegerile parlamentare," "Doar alegând #EchipaValeriuIftime, echipa PNL, putem schimba ceva," and "Poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot" explicitly aim to influence voting behavior. This clearly meets the criteria of Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. While it mentions Valeriu Iftime's role, it's not an objective news report or analysis. The language used is overtly promotional and persuasive, lacking the neutrality expected in journalistic content.  The call to action ("Ne vedem la vot!") further reinforces its non-journalistic nature.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a structured appeal for votes, presented as a campaign message. The use of hashtags, the clear call to action, and the explicit mention of the candidate and party all point to a deliberate attempt to influence the election, not simply express an opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1098833928367867</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334/2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Valeriu Iftime), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support the PNL party. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's content is promotional, not journalistic, and lacks the objectivity required for neutral information dissemination.  The post's call to action directly encourages voting for a specific candidate and party.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Valeriu Iftime</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Vocea Botoșani, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1098833928367867) cu caracter de propagandă electorală, care promovează explicit candidatul Valeriu Iftime și Partidul Național Liberal (PNL), îndemnând la vot pentru acesta. Postarea, cu un buget de sub 100 RON, a atins o audiență estimată între 100.000 și 500.000 de persoane, utilizând fraze precum „Echipa Valeriu Iftime”, „PNL”, și „Poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot”, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea PNL.  Informațiile de contact ale advertiserului sunt office@voceabotosani.ro și +40759112233.  Această postare constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie, conform articolului 98 t).
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
